document_data.mainbody:
Cormac was the husband of Brigid, a lady of of means from the Rivington district of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Cormac was a foppish man who preferred the color green. He wore a brown vest over a swamp-green frilled tunic and a large green feathered beret. Cormac average human features, shaved head, hazel eyes, and fair skin.
In the , the city of Baldurs Gate was under a looming threat of the army of the Absolute and was flooded by refugees from the Western Heartlands fleeing from the cultists. During the time of crisis, crime was on the rise, and the criminal organization known as The Guild was getting bold and aggressive. Brigids husband Cormac was attacked by the Guilds thugs, mugged, and beaten. Brigid was outraged by the crime wave and was prepared to give a stern talking to the Flaming Fist mercenaries of Rivington where the attack took place.
